# allowsSimultaneousRecognitionDuringLift

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the interaction allows recognition of other gestures during the lift activity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsSimultaneousRecognitionDuringLift: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you set the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDragInteraction/allowsSimultaneousRecognitionDuringLift] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the interaction is canceled when another gesture is recognized. If you set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] (the default value), competing gesture recognizers fail.
